source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_00<tab>This hunter's unbridled enthusiasm can mean only one thing: the hunt is on!
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_00<tab>楽座街のライバルモブハンターは、ひと狩り行きたいようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_01<tab>Though you have never met him, this hearty hunter seems to know you quite well. So well, in fact, he considers you his rival. Perhaps that is why he chooses to share with you an unusual Clan Hunt bill he procured from their board. The strange scribblings describe a great wyvern by the name Rathalos. Though the bill makes no mention of its origins, the hearty hunter has discovered it was last seen somewhere at the Azim Steppe. He suggests you visit Reunion to learn more of your prey while he readies himself for the hunt.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_01<tab>ライバルモブハンターから、リオレウスというモブの討伐依頼書のことを聞いた。リオレウスを狩るべく、まずはアジムステップの再会の市で、情報収集をしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_02<tab>Try as you might, you fail to find anyone who can attest to the existence of this great wyvern. On the word of a wayfaring hunter, however, you decide to consult the Qestir, masters of the Reunion markets, in hopes of learning more of your prey.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_02<tab>再会の市で情報収集をした。さらに詳しい情報を得るべく、再会の市にいる「心配性なケスティル族」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_03<tab>You speak with a merchant of the Qestir tribe, though his initial response is only an expression of grave concern. He then points southwest toward Yat Khaal. Perhaps there you will find some trace of the Rathalos.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_03<tab>心配性なケスティル族と話した。彼は、リオレウスについて思い当たる節があるらしく、再会の市から南西の方角を指差した。アジムステップの刃の海の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA99101 /var>」で待機してみよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_04<tab>While waiting for signs of the wyvern, you are confronted by a curious talking cat claiming to be a fledgling Felyne hunter. He too has come in search of the Rathalos, and no sooner does he speak its name than a colossal, crimson-scaled wyvern swoops down from the sky to claim a dzo for its next meal. At last, the hunt begins. The Felyne hunter wastes no time chasing after the Rathalos, heading northwest toward Bardam's Mettle.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA99101 /var>で待機していたところ、ネコのような生き物のアイルーと出会った。リオレウスの討伐依頼書は、アイルーが書いたものらしい。途中、リオレウスが付近に現れるが、獲物を捕らえると北西の方角へ飛び去っていってしまった。リオレウスを狩猟すべく、アジムステップのバルダム覇道前にいる「アイルー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive at Bardam's Mettle to find the Felyne hunter is ready, not to fight, but support. Preferably from the safety of the entrance. That said, he does offer you several potions to ensure you are duly prepared. The battle before you will likely be fierce, and to that end the Felyne hunter suggests you seek reinforcements before jumping into the fray.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_05バルダム覇道前にいるアイルーと話した。「リオレウス」の狩猟に挑み、アイルーの依頼を達成しよう！

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_06<tab>The Rathalos was truly a beast worthy of its title, but not even the king of the skies was a match for you and your comrades. The Felyne hunter is certain to be glad to hear of your success.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_06<tab>リオレウスを狩猟した。バルダム覇道前にいる「アイルー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_07<tab>The Felyne hunter is in awe of your strength. Wishing to bear witness to your future feats of heroism and derring-do, he asks to join you as an adventuring companion. It was quite fortunate that you happened to glimpse his mark bill. He is surprised, however, to hear you saw it not on the Clan Hunt board, but from a hunter in Kugane. He asks if you might introduce him to the man who ultimately guided you to aid him.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_07<tab>アイルーと話した。リオレウス狩猟の報せを聞いて喜ぶ一方、クガネにいるライバルモブハンターの存在が気になるようだ。楽座街の「ライバルモブハンター」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_08<tab>You arrive in Kugane to find your supposed rival has just finished warming up and is ready to hunt. A pity you have already claimed his prize. You expect him to be disappointed, perhaps even cross with you, but instead he is pleased to see you proved yourself worthy of being his adversary. His smithy companion is more concerned with what, if anything, you recovered from the Rathalos. Hearing you carved a scale from its hide, he jumps at the opportunity to use it in his work, offering to fashion you armor if you can procure more. If you should take him up on his offer, the hunt for Rathalos has only begun.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_08<tab>ライバルモブハンターと話した。彼はリオレウスの狩猟を果たせなかったが、ライバルとして、冒険者の腕前を褒め称えた。また、相棒の加工屋の男は、リオレウスの体から入手できる「<var 28 ((Item)) F2584701 /var>」を取引してくれるという。<var 28 ((Item)) F2584701 /var>を集め、特別な報酬を手に入れよう！

target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SEQ_09<tab>

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_00<tab>Gather information in Reunion at the Azim Steppe.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_00<tab>再会の市でリオレウスの情報を集める

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the concerned Qestiri merchant.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_01<tab>心配性なケスティル族と話す

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_02<tab>Lie in wait at the designated location.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA99101 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the Felyne.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_03<tab>バルダム覇道前にいるアイルーと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_04<tab>Confront the Rathalos in the Great Hunt.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_04<tab>リオレウス狩猟戦を攻略する

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the Felyne.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_05<tab>バルダム覇道前にいるアイルーと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_06<tab>Speak with the hearty hunter in Kugane.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_TODO_06<tab>クガネのライバルモブハンターと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_001<tab>Well, well, if it isn't my old rival, <var 29 EB02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_001ワッハッハ！
俺は、ちょいと腕に覚えのあるモブハンターだ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_002<tab>Come at last to learn from a <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> hunter of elite marks, have you?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_002誰かと思えば、
俺のライバル、)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃないか！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_003<tab>Forgive me if I seem overly presumptuous. Being the renowned adventurer that you are, I've always considered you to be a rival of sorts. A little healthy competition goes a long way in keeping one's skills sharp, you know.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_003おっと！　こいつぁ、失敬。
一流の冒険者だって評判のあんたを、
俺が勝手に、ライバルと呼んでるだけさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_004<tab>Forgive me if I seem overly presumptuous. Being the renowned hunter that you are, I've always considered you to be a rival of sorts. A little healthy competition goes a long way in keeping one's skills sharp, you know.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_004おっと！　こいつぁ、失敬。
一流のモブハンターだって評判のあんたを、
俺が勝手に、ライバルと呼んでるだけさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_005<tab>Gahaha, aye! But a hunter ain't worth shite without a smithy to keep him armed and armored.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_005ガッハッハ！
俺は、流れの加工屋だ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_006<tab>You'll have to excuse him. He's never been one for social graces. But he's a damn fine hunter, and what he brings back to the forge keeps me in business.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_006こいつがモンスターを狩り、その素材で俺が武具を造る！
俺にとっては、いい相棒なんだが、どうにも慣れ慣れしくてな！
いきなり、変な事を言い出してすまないが、許してくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_007<tab>Who has time for grace when game is afoot. Which reminds me, I have news of a quarry that may pique your interest.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_007ワッハッハ！
ま、それはさておき、あんたが興味を持ちそうな話があるぜ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_008<tab>I recently came across a rather peculiar bill on the Clan Hunt board. Here, have a look.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_008最近、クガネのセントリオボードに、
一風変わった依頼書が張り出されているのを見かけてな。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>The bill depicts a crimson wyvern unlike anything you have ever seen. Unfortunately, further reading of the bill reveals nothing of its origins.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>見たことのない、赤い竜の絵が描かれている……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_010<tab>Strange, isn't it? Not only is the drawing unabashedly crude, the bill itself lacks the formality expected of anything approved by the Centurio clan. Still, a bounty is a bounty.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_010どうだ、妙な手配書だろう？
絵の画風も違えば、書式も違う……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_011<tab>Before setting out, though, I thought it wise to first confirm the details of the request, and therein lies the rub─the Clansmen weren't even aware this bill had been posted. Likely the escapades of some mischievous youth, they said.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_011それもそのはず……問い合わせてみたんだが、
クラン・セントリオが発行したものじゃあないらしい。
本部の連中は、誰かのイタズラだと考えているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_012<tab>But if this beast truly <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> out there somewhere, what manner of hunter would I be if I didn't go and find out?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_012……だが、俺のモブハンターとしての血が騒ぐんだ。
このモブは実在する……それも、かなりの大物だとな！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_013<tab>And from what I've been told, you're never one to back down from a chance at adventure. So how about it? Will you take up the hunt?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_013どうだい、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
あんたも、このモブを狩りに行かないか？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A1_000_001<tab>Count me in!
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A1_000_001<tab>ひと狩りいこうぜ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A1_000_002<tab>I have no time for rumors and hearsay.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A1_000_002<tab>ただのイタズラだと思う

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_015<tab>Every bit the thrill seeker I marked you for. Glad to hear it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_015ワッハッハ！
そう言ってくれると思っていたぜ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_016<tab>Oh, come now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Where's that sense of adventure I've heard so much about? This could be the opportunity of a lifetime!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_016まあまあ、そう言うなよ！
未知のモブ捜索なんて、ロマンに溢れてるじゃねえか！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_017<tab>To make things a little more interesting, what do you say we make this a race, eh? To see who can slay it first.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_017よし、それじゃあ、俺とあんたで、
どっちが早く、例のモブを仕留められるか勝負と行こう！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_018<tab>I'll even give you a hint to get you on your way. The beast we're after is a Rathalos─king of the skies they call it. From what I've gathered, it was last spotted somewhere around the Azim Steppe.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_018ただし、俺は公平な男だからな……依頼書の情報を共有しておくぜ！
モブの名前は「リオレウス」、空の王者とも呼ばれるらしい。
出現場所は……アジムステップと書かれているな。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_019<tab>You're like to learn more if you speak with the locals at Reunion. As for me, I still need to prepare before I can head out, so consider this a head start. Good luck, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and may the best hunter win!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_019となれば、「再会の市」で情報収集をするべきだろう。
俺は、慎重に準備を整えてから出発するつもりだが……
この勝負、負けるつもりはないからな！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_030<tab>A red wyvern by the name Rathalos? I'm sorry, but you must be mistaken. I've heard stories of a great wyvern that slumbers in the mountains to the north, but it was not red, and most certainly does not go by that name.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_030リオレウスという赤い竜を知っているか、だと？
アジムステップには巨竜が棲まうという伝承があるが、
それとは違うのか？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_031<tab>Not that it matters now. Rumor has it the beast was recently slain by a band of wyvern hunters. <sigh> If only we had found it first...
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_031もっとも、その巨竜は、
どこぞの「竜狩りの達人」が倒しちまったらしいがな。
俺が狙っていた獲物なのに、先を越されたぜ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_032<tab>But if this Rathalos you speak of truly exists, we may yet have another chance. Mark my words: this beast will fall by a blade of the Oronir!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_032ま、リオレウスとかいう竜が本当にいたとしたら、
次こそ、俺たち屈強なオロニル族の戦士が、狩ってやるさ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_033<tab>Still, if this Rathalos you speak of truly exists, slaying such a beast would bring great honor to my tribe. Mark my words: this beast will fall by a blade of the Oronir!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_033ま、どんな竜が現れようが、
俺たち屈強なオロニル族の戦士が、狩ってやるさ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_035<tab>You wait and see. Slaying this Rathalos will bring great glory to the Oronir.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_ORONIRMAN01554_000_035リオレウスだか何だか知らねえが、
もし見つけたら、俺たちオロニル族の戦士が、狩ってやるさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_040<tab>A red wyvern named Rathalos? ...Oh dear.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_040リオレウスという赤い竜を知っているか、と？
うーん、関係するか、わかりませんが、
こんな怖い話を聞いたことがあります。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_041<tab>Perhaps the story I heard was true, then. Of a young man from the Ura clan leading a flock of dzos down from the mountains.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_041とあるウラ族の男が、交易品を売るべく、
家畜のケナガウシを連れ、再会の市へ向かったときの話です。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_042<tab>He was making his way to Reunion when a fierce wind began to blow. A terrible, howling gale which left him all but blinded. To his horror, he soon realized the deafening roar he heard was not of the wind's making.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_042暴風で視界の悪い中、市へ向かって進んでいたとき、
上空から、雷鳴のような音が轟いたそうです。
……そして、その直後！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_043<tab>He claims it was that of a great wyvern, which descended from on high to claim several dzos from his flock, disappearing into the sky as quickly as it came.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_043突然、巨大な竜が飛来し、
連れていたケナガウシを鷲掴みにして、飛び去っていったのです！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_044<tab>Needless to say he ran to Reunion with all haste, telling everyone of what had happened. But the man is a known liar and a swindler. Who would believe such a tale coming from him?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_044男は一目散に、居留地へと逃げ帰り、
人々にこの話をしたのですが、誰も信じませんでした。
彼には、詐欺の前科がありましたからね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_045<tab>Thankfully I've not had the displeasure of seeing such a creature here. Oh, how I hope his story is yet another lie.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_URAWOMAN01554_000_045噂の巨竜は、私も見たことがありませんし、
件の男の証言を信じているわけではないのですが……。
本当だったら恐ろしいですね。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_KHAWOMAN01554_000_050<tab>A gargantuan red wyvern? I'm sorry, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, but I'm not overly familiar with the comings and goings of this place. I only visit on occasion to do a small bit of business.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_KHAWOMAN01554_000_050赤く巨大な竜を見たことがないかって？
すまない、私はあまりこの辺りの事情に詳しくないんだ。
たまたま用事があって、再会の市に立ち寄っただけさ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_KHAWOMAN01554_000_051<tab>Perhaps you should speak with the Qestir. Though <var 1A 02 /var>speak<var 1A 01 /var> is perhaps not the right word, seeing as they do not. At any rate, you will find none more knowledgeable of the happenings in the Azim Steppe.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_KHAWOMAN01554_000_051そうだな……。
ケスティル族なら、この辺りの情報をよく知っているだろう。
無口すぎる連中だが、聞いてみるといい。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_KHAWOMAN01554_000_055<tab>If anyone would know of this wyvern you seek, it would be the Qestir.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_KHAWOMAN01554_000_055ケスティル族なら、この辺りの情報をよく知っているだろう。
無口すぎる連中だが、聞いてみるといい。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_060<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Already on the hunt, are we? I suggest you move quickly. Once I've warmed up, the wyvern is as good as slain.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_060ワッハッハ！
しっかり準備運動しておかないと、ケガをしてしまうからな！
体がほぐれたら、出発だ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_065<tab>You'd best head to Reunion if you haven't already and see what you can learn from the locals. I'll be along after a few more squats.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_065まずは「再会の市」で、リオレウスの情報を集めるといいだろう。
どっちが早く、例のモブを仕留められるか勝負だ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_070<tab>Don't look so surprised. Even a smithy needs to stay in shape, you know.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_070ガッハッハ！
素材が手に入ったら、すぐ加工できるように準備運動だ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_075<tab>It's nice to see someone taking this barmy fool's stories seriously for once. Crazy as they seem, though, every now and again they turn out to be true.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_075しかし、あんたも物好きだねぇ、
相棒の荒唐無稽な話に乗るなんてな！
だが、こいつの根拠のない自信は当たるぜ、たまにだけどよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_QESTIRMERCHANT01554_000_080<tab>...
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_QESTIRMERCHANT01554_000_080<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_QESTIRMERCHANT01554_000_090<tab>...!
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_QESTIRMERCHANT01554_000_090<tab>…………！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_091<tab>Upon hearing of a red wyvern, the Qestiri merchant takes on a grave expression.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_091リオレウスについて尋ねると、
心配性なケスティル族の表情が一変した。
どうやら、何か心当たりがあるようだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_QESTIRMERCHANT01554_000_092<tab>...
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_QESTIRMERCHANT01554_000_092<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_093<tab>The Qestiri merchant points southwestward. Perhaps you will find some clue to the wyvern's whereabouts in that direction.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_093心配性なケスティル族は、南西の草原を指差している。
どうやら、そこに何かがあるらしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You arrive at the area the Qestiri merchant appeared to be indicating. All you can do now is lie in wait for your prey.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_100心配性なケスティル族が指し示したのは、この辺りだ。
この場所で、リオレウスが現れないか待機してみよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_105<tab>(-???-)What's this? Oh, a hunter! And a furrrmidable-looking one at that!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_105(-？？？？-)ニャニャ！？
強そうなハンターさん、発見だニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_110<tab>(-Fashionable Feline-)Have you come to help, then? To hunt the meownster Rathalos?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_110(-二足歩行のネコ-)も、もしかして、
リオレウスの狩猟を手伝ってくれる、
ハンターさんかニャ？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A2_000_001<tab>After seeing the bounty I couldn't resist!
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A2_000_001<tab>依頼書を見て狩りにきた！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A2_000_002<tab>A...talking cat?
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A2_000_002<tab>ネコが喋った！？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_125<tab>(-Fashionable Feline-)Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, thank you! I knew I was right to post that bill.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_125(-二足歩行のネコ-)来てくれて、助かったニャ！
何を隠そうボクが、依頼書を貼った依頼主ニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_130<tab>(-Fashionable Feline-)Oh, that's rich coming from you. Or have you not looked in a mirror lately?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_130(-二足歩行のネコ-)ニャ！？　何を言うニャ！
そっちこそ、ネコみたいな見た目だニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_135<tab>(-Fashionable Feline-)And what's wrong with a talking cat? Have you not seen the turtles and fish around these parts?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_135(-二足歩行のネコ-)喋って当然ニャ！
ここに来るまでに、亀やナマズが喋ってるのを見たニャ！
驚かなくても、いいはずニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_140<tab>I'm an apprentice Felyne hunter, and I've come to this place in search of meownsters. Rathalos to be precise.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_140申し遅れたニャ。
ボクは、アイルーの見習いハンター……
故郷から、はるばるリオレウスを追ってきたニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_145<tab>But even with nine lives I could never slay one on my own. That's why I posted that notice seeking help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_145でもリオレウスは、と～っても強いニャ……。
今のボクの力じゃ、到底倒せないから、
討伐依頼書を作って、強いハンターさんを募集したのニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_150<tab>There's a reason they're often referred to as king of the skies, after all.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_150どれくらい強いかっていうと……
上空からの急降下攻撃は、空の王者と呼ばれるに相応しいほどニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_155<tab>Some also call them fire wyverns, on account of their ability to breathe fire. I feel paw-ful just thinking about all the hunters burned to cinders in their wake.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_155火竜の名の由来にもなった、灼熱のブレス攻撃にも要注意ニャ！
その炎には、多くのハンターが犠牲になったニャ……。
それから、それから…………

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_160<tab>Yes, yes, and they roar exactly like that. Would you believe it's powerful enough to stun their prey?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_160そうニャ！
今みたいな、恐ろしい咆哮でハンターを怯ませてくるニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_165<tab>That was him! That was a Rathalos! Still willing to help, I hope?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_165あ、あれが火竜、リオレウスだニャ！
挑む覚悟は、あるかニャ……？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_170<tab>What a day, what a day. Both a meownster and a furrrocious hunter to slay it? I sure got the cream today!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_170やったニャー！
勇敢なハンターさんに出会えて、ボクは運がいいニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_175<tab>Let's hurry. He seemed to be heading northwest, back into the meowntains.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_175今、リオレウスは、北西の山の辺りを根城にしてるみたいニャ！
早速、向かってみるニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_180<tab>Oh, before I forget. I never did ask your name.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_180そうだニャ！
まだ、ハンターさんの名前を聞いてなかったニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_185<tab>Nice to meet you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Now, let's be off!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_185)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、だニャ！
それじゃあ、改めてよろしくだニャー！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_190<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Already on the hunt I see. If you still mean to beat me, I suggest you move quickly. Once I've finished warming up that wyvern is as good as slain.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_190ワッハッハ！
しっかり準備運動しておかないと、ケガをしてしまうからな！
体がほぐれたら、出発だ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_195<tab>Hahaha! Even a smithy needs to stay in shape, you know.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_195ガッハッハ！
素材が手に入ったら、すぐ加工できるように準備運動だ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_QESTIRMERCHANT01554_000_200<tab>...
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_QESTIRMERCHANT01554_000_200<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_205<tab>The Qestiri merchant points southwestward. Perhaps you will find some clue to the Rathalos's whereabouts in that direction.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_205心配性なケスティル族は、南西の草原を指差している。
どうやら、その方向に何かがあるらしい。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_210<tab>The Rathalos is somewhere along that path, I just know it!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_210)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
リオレウスは、きっとこの山道の先にいるはずニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_211<tab>But I'm afraid you'll have to go without me. As I am right meow, I fear I'd only slow you down.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_211ボクは、ここで待っているニャ……。
ハンターとして、まだまだ未熟だから、
ついて行っても足手まといになってしまうのニャ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_212<tab>Before you go, though, I insist you take these with you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_212でも、力になりたいから、
せめてこれを受け取ってほしいニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_213<tab>When cat-astrophe strikes, a hunter should never be without mega potions. I don't know if you normally keep medicine on hand to treat your wounds, but I guarantee you've never had anything quite like that.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_213それは「回復薬グレート」だニャ！
傷ついた体を癒やしてくれるハンター必携の品だニャ。
リオレウスの討伐に、きっと役立つはずニャ。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_214<tab>When you and your friends are ready, head on in. You...do have friends to help, right?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_214それじゃあ、準備が整ったら突入するのニャ！
……ところで、何人くらい仲間を集められそうかニャ？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_215<tab>Eight? I thought hunters usually fight in groups of four... Well, I suppose you know best.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_215……え？
8人で狩猟に挑戦するニャ？
ハンターは4人が基本と思っていたけど、容赦ないニャ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_216<tab>During the battle the Great Hunt, you will gain access to the duty action <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Mega Potion<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_216リオレウス狩猟戦では、
コンテンツアクション「回復薬グレート」が使用できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_217<tab>Be advised that, while it can be used to restore a large amount of HP, its usage is limited.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_217使用回数に上限がありますが、HPを大幅に回復できます。
ぜひ討伐に役立てましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_218<tab>Upon clearing the duty, you can claim a special reward by examining the remains of the Rathalos. Be certain to do so before leaving the instance.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_218また、討伐したリオレウスの体を調べると、
報酬となる特殊なアイテムを入手できます。
コンテンツ退出前に、忘れずに調べるようにしましょう。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_220<tab>If you find yourself in a pinch, don't forget to use that mega potion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_220頑張ってニャ！
ピンチになったら、回復薬グレートを使うのニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_230<tab>I saw the whole thing. That was meow-gnificent!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_230おかえりだニャー！
リオレウスの討伐、見事だったニャ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは、凄腕のハンターだニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_231<tab>You even managed to retrieve a scale from his remains. I'm impressed!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_231討伐したリオレウスから、「」も入手できたニャ！
とっても、とーっても嬉しいのニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_232<tab>I realize this is sudden, but it would mean so much to me if I could join you on more adventures. Would you...would you accept me as your Palico?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_232……ボク、決めたニャ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんのオトモになりたいニャ！
一緒に冒険させてほしいニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_Q3_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A3_000_001<tab>It would be my pleasure.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A3_000_001<tab>よろしく、相棒！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A3_000_002<tab>That depends. What's the reward for slaying the Rathalos?
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_A3_000_002<tab>そんなことより、報酬は？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_234<tab>I promise to be the purrrfect companion. You won't regret this!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_234やったニャー！
よろしくだニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_235<tab>O-Oh, of course. You hunters are an astute lot, aren't you. Well, the thing is...I used the last of my funds to purchase those mega potions...
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_235ニャ！？　ぬ、抜け目ないのニャ……。
実は、回復薬グレートの調合でお金を使っちゃったから、
一文無しなのニャ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_236<tab>But I promise I'll make it up to you as the purrrfect Palico companion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_236オ、オトモになるから、見逃してほしいのニャ！
よろしくだニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_237<tab>And to think this is all because you saw my bill on the Hunt board.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_237いやーやっぱり、ボクは運がいいニャ！
こんな凄腕のハンターさんと巡り合えるなんて、
頑張って依頼書を作った甲斐があったニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_238<tab>Hm? A hunter in Kugane showed it to you?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_238……ニャ？
クガネに別のハンターさんがいて、
その人から依頼書のことを教えてもらったのニャ？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_239<tab>Curious. Do you think we could go and pay them a visit? If not for this hunter, we never would have met.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_239ふむふむ、ちょっと気になるニャ。
せっかくだし、会いに行ってみてもいいかニャ？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_240<tab>Then let's be off to Kugane!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_240ありがとニャー！
それじゃあ、クガネのハンターさんのところへ行くニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_250<tab>That should do it. I'm warmed up and ready to go hunting!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_250ワッハッハ！
よっしゃー！　準備運動はバッチリだ！
いつでも狩りに行けるぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_251<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I thought you'd already left. With my preparations complete, you'll need to work fast if you mean to beat me.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_251おお！　俺のライバル、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
俺たちは今から、リオレウスを狩りに行くところだ！
あんたも準備は万全か！？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_252<tab>You've only meow finished preparing?
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_252<tab>……もしかして、ずっと準備だけしていたのニャ？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_253<tab>Wh-What is that!? Another monster in need of slaying?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_253うおお、なんだこの喋るネコは！？
こいつも未知のモブか！？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_254<tab>I'm no meownster, you brute. I'm <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s faithful and dependable Palico.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_254モブじゃないニャ！
ボクは)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの、
オトモのアイルーだニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_255<tab>A...Palico? Ahem, my apologies. If you're as dependable as you are adorable, I've no doubt <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> values your companionship.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_255ワッハッハ！
そいつぁ、失敬した！
ずいぶんと可愛らしい相棒じゃないか！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_256<tab>But let's return to the matter at hand, shall we? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, are you ready to set out on our hunt for the Rathalos?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_256さて、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ！
あんたも準備をバッチリ整えたと見える！
だが、俺たちの方が、先にリオレウスを狩猟してみせるぞ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_257<tab>You've already slain him!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_257なにぃー！
もうリオレウスは倒してしまった、だと！？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_258<tab>Hahaha! I'd expect nothing less from my rival. Indeed, you're every bit the hunter I imagined you'd be.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_258……ワッハッハ！
さすがは、俺のライバルだ！
一流のモブハンターと呼ばれる実力は、伊達ではないな！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_259<tab>Hahaha! I'd expect nothing less from my rival. Indeed, you're every bit the adventurer I imagined you'd be.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_259……ワッハッハ！
さすがは、俺のライバルだ！
一流の冒険者と呼ばれる実力は、伊達ではないな！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_260<tab>Suppose that's what we get for that extra set of squats.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_260ガッハッハ！
準備運動している場合じゃなかったな！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_261<tab>Tell me, friend. Were you able to recover anything from the body?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_261ところでよ、
俺は、リオレウスからどんな素材が取れるのか、興味があるぜ。
何か持って帰ってきちゃいないかい？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_262<tab>As a matter of fact, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> carved a scale off the Rathalos's hide!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_262さっきの戦いで、リオレウスから剥がれ落ちた、
「」を拾ってきたニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_100_262<tab>That's a mighty fine material for smithing. Mind if I have a look?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_100_262おぉ！　ドラゴンの鱗は、加工素材によく使うんだ。
ちょっとだけ、触らせてくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_263<tab>Aye, this is a wyvern's scale alright. Light as a feather and tougher than steel. There's still a touch of heat to it, too.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_263……こいつぁ、面白い素材だ！
頑強にして軽量……しかも、ほのかに熱を帯びていやがる。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_264<tab>If you'd like, I'd be more than willing to fashion you some armor with it. I'll need more than a single scale, of course.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_264この「」が何枚か集まったら、
俺に加工を頼んじゃくれねぇかい？
最高にイカした防具を仕立ててみせるぜ！？

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_265<tab>You'll find no better mail than that forged with Rathalos scales. What do you say?
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_265ボクの故郷でも、リオレウスの素材を使って、
武具に加工していたニャ！
頼んでみようニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_266<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I can't thank you enough for your help in slaying that Rathalos.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_266……)) (( )) 02 /var>さん！
リオレウスの狩猟、本当にありがとうだニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_267<tab>If you plan to go hunting again, don't hesitate to call. We'll show those meownsters what for!
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_FELYNE_000_267一緒に冒険してくれる時は、いつでも呼んでほしいニャ！
これから、よろしくだニャ！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_268<tab>You can now trade Rathalos scales to the smithy in exchange for various goods.
target: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_268<tab>加工屋の男と、「<var 28 ((Item)) F2584701 /var>」を取引できるようになりました！

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_269<tab>Rathalos scales can be obtained by defeating the Rathalos in the Great Hunt.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SYSTEM_000_269「」は、「リオレウス狩猟戦」にて、
討伐したリオレウスの体を調べることで入手できます。

source: TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_270<tab>Nothing like a few hundred squats to limber up before smithing.
target:
TEXT_STMBDY991_01554_SMITHERY_000_270ガッハッハ！
体も温まって、加工の準備はバッチリだぜ！
